title: A godly song, entituled, A farewell to the vvorld, made by a godly Christian, named Thomas Byll, being the parish clerke of West-Felton, as he lay vpon his death-bed shewing the vanitie of the world, and his desire to be dissolued. To the tune of, Fortune my foe
author: Byll, Thomas.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed [by A. Mathewes] for Henry Gossen,
